name: Lamb to the Slaughter
description:
After realizing your farm lamb destiny, you decide to take matters into your own hooves and destroy the SLAUGHTER HOUSE!

Take your stand against the farmers who've killed your sheepy friends and family! Wield boomerang meat cleavers to cut your way to your ultimate revenge, exploding the building of sheep nightmares! 

Cause a lot of carnage in this game made for the Alekstudio JAM! 2023 game jam! Theme....CARNAGE! 

This game was made in 72 hours over a long weekend. Hope you enjoy!
